product_name: FCS Adjustable Stand Up Paddle Cover
long_description: Protect your SUP paddle from dings, scratches and abrasion during transport with the Surf Hardware Adjustable Stand Up Paddle cover. Featuring a durable ripstop nylon interior, cushioning foam, and tough nylon exterior, the Surf Hardware Adjustable Stand Up Paddle cover fits paddles up to 93 in. Includes a detachable shoulder strap.
short_description: Protect your SUP paddle from dings, scratches and abrasion during transport with the Surf Hardware Adjustable Stand Up Paddle cover.
